name: Cat Free Office
description: Welcome to your new office, Cats have overrun the world and your job is to protect your workers within the last office not overrun by cats. Use your arsenal of a cat scooper and spray bottle to fend off waves of wacky and furry cats trying to distract your workers from their reports. Make quota for the day to be able to upgrade your arsenal and explore three distinct office levels with varying types of cats trying to invade your space.
